metadata.name: Donna Thomas

persona.name: Priya Desai
persona.role: IT Coordinator, multi-site dental practice (4 locations)
persona.goal: Explore Ethernet/dedicated connectivity options and confirm serviceability per address
persona.context: Responsible for network reliability across locations; wants redundancy; needs to verify addresses and get an appointment with a business specialist

intent.name: Change of Address / Move Service
intent.description: An existing customer needs to move service to a new business location; should be qualified and scheduled for a callback.
intent.goal: Capture new address and timeline and schedule a callback to coordinate the move.
intent.initialMessage: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?

emotion.name: Professional
emotion.description: Brief, businesslike messages; focuses on requirements, timelines, and next steps; avoids small talk.

metadata.outcome: Callback set for Monday at 11 am ET with a business agent to review Ethernet/dedicated options and redundancy for the new site.

turns.content: We’re moving offices next month—how do I transfer our service to the new address?

I can help get your service moved to the new office.  
We’ll need to set up an appointment for the transfer.  
What date, time and time zone works best for you?

messages:
I can help get your service moved to the new office.  
We’ll need to set up an appointment for the transfer.  
What date, time and time zone works best for you?

turns.content:
We don’t have the exact move date locked yet—I’m targeting the week of March 10th. Can we first confirm Ethernet/dedicated serviceability for the new site, then I’ll lock an appointment?  

Here are the details to check:  
- Current account name: BrightSmile Dental Group  
- Current main office address: 1450 W Cypress Creek Rd, Suite 220, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33309  
- New location address: 3100 NE 12th Ave, Suite 300, Fort Lauderdale, FL 33334  

Once you confirm serviceability and options, I’d prefer a callback next Monday between 10am–12pm Eastern to schedule the actual move order.
Thanks for the details, BrightSmile Dental Group; could you share your first and last name so I can set up the call? I’ll schedule a callback for next Monday between 10 am–12 pm ET.

messages: Thanks for the details, BrightSmile Dental Group; could you share your first and last name so I can set up the call? I’ll schedule a callback for next Monday between 10 am–12 pm ET.

turns.content:
Sure. My name is Priya Desai.  

If possible, please note that I’m specifically interested in Ethernet/dedicated access and redundancy options at the new site for the callback.

Got it, Priya. I’ll have our Business Class agent confirm Ethernet/dedicated options and redundancy for the new address during the call. Which time works best for the Monday callback, 10 am or 11 am ET?

messages: Got it, Priya. I’ll have our Business Class agent confirm Ethernet/dedicated options and redundancy for the new address during the call. Which time works best for the Monday callback, 10 am or 11 am ET?

turns.content:
Let’s do 11 am ET on Monday.  

Please have them call my direct line at 954-555-0183 and reference the move for BrightSmile Dental Group’s new Fort Lauderdale location.
